subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: On Old Timers’ Day, the current edition of the Yankees hit five home runs, with Carlos Beltran accounting for two and Alex Rodriguez getting his 668th, in a 14-3 pasting of Detroit.
snippet: On Old Timers’ Day, the current edition of the Yankees hit five home runs, with Carlos Beltran accounting for two and Alex Rodriguez getting his 668th, in a 14-3 pasting of Detroit.
